pages.text: Lava is the kekki genkai of fire and earth release and currently contains 3 moves. However, only 2 will normally be unlocked as the third is exclusive to the 4 tails jinchuriki

pages.title: Scorching rocks
pages.text: upon using this jutsu the user will launch a ball of molten rock where they are looking. This ball will deal damage to blocks as well as set blocks and mobs on fire.$(br) $(li)Max charge:20$(li)Chakra taken at max charge:800$(li)Jutsuxp needed:200

pages.title: Lava melting rock
pages.text: upon using this jutsu the user will spray out lava in the direction they are facing, this will place lava source blocks that will quickly turn into obsidian and after a short delay vanish.$(br) $(li)max charge:10$(li)Chakra taken at max:500$(li)Jutsuxp needed:200

pages.title: Lava chakra mode
pages.text: This is the 4 tails exclusive jutsu, upon use the user will be surrounded in a cloak that enhances the users speed and gives strength, it also deals damage to nearby mobs.$(br) $(li)Max charge:1$(li)Chakra taken per second:10$(li)Jutsuxp needed:250
